bug.short_desc: Unable to update some F24 kf5 packages
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem:
File conflict between three packages, probably due to akonadi repackaging
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): 16.04 to 16.08
How reproducible: $ sudo dnf update -y Failed to synchronize cache for repo 'fedora-chromium-stable', disabling. Last metadata expiration check: 0:03:50 ago on Thu Oct 13 13:08:44 2016. Dependencies resolved. ============================================================================================================================================================================================================================================================================================ Package Arch Version Repository Size ============================================================================================================================================================================================================================================================================================ Upgrading: kf5-kldap x86_64 16.08.1-1.fc24 updates 125 k kf5-kldap-devel x86_64 16.08.1-1.fc24 updates 33 k kf5-kmailtransport x86_64 16.08.1-1.fc24 updates 207 k kf5-kmailtransport-devel x86_64 16.08.1-1.fc24 updates 31 k Skipping packages with broken dependencies: kf5-akonadi-mime x86_64 16.08.1-1.fc24 updates 101 k kf5-akonadi-mime-devel x86_64 16.08.1-1.fc24 updates 48 k kf5-akonadi-notes x86_64 16.08.1-1.fc24 updates 29 k kf5-akonadi-notes-devel x86_64 16.08.1-1.fc24 updates 15 k kf5-akonadi-server x86_64 16.08.1-2.fc24 updates 1.9 M kf5-akonadi-server-devel x86_64 16.08.1-2.fc24 updates 253 k kf5-akonadi-server-mysql x86_64 16.08.1-2.fc24 updates 11 k rubygem-ruby-libvirt x86_64 0.7.0-1.fc24 updates-testing 87 k
Transaction Summary ============================================================================================================================================================================================================================================================================================ Upgrade 4 Packages Skip 8 Packages
Total size: 397 k Downloading Packages: [SKIPPED] kf5-kldap-16.08.1-1.fc24.x86_64.rpm: Already downloaded [SKIPPED] kf5-kldap-devel-16.08.1-1.fc24.x86_64.rpm: Already downloaded [SKIPPED] kf5-kmailtransport-16.08.1-1.fc24.x86_64.rpm: Already downloaded [SKIPPED] kf5-kmailtransport-devel-16.08.1-1.fc24.x86_64.rpm: Already downloaded Running transaction check Transaction check succeeded. Running transaction test The downloaded packages were saved in cache until the next successful transaction. You can remove cached packages by executing 'dnf clean packages'. Error: Transaction check error: file /usr/lib64/qt5/plugins/kf5/kio/smtp.so from install of kf5-kmailtransport-16.08.1-1.fc24.x86_64 conflicts with file from package kf5-akonadi-16.04.3-2.fc24.x86_64 file /usr/lib64/qt5/plugins/kf5/kio/ldap.so from install of kf5-kldap-16.08.1-1.fc24.x86_64 conflicts with file from package kf5-akonadi-16.04.3-2.fc24.x86_64
Error Summary -------------
Actual results: Package conflict
Expected results: Packages updated.
Additional info:
It's a packaging problem in one or more of the conflicting packages, not a dnf problem. Reassigning to kf5-akonadi which is at least closer the mark.

are you using any 3rd party repos or copr ?
In particular, what does this say?
rpm -q qt5-qtbase

also, try using --best option too, it may help identify what's going wrong, e.g.
sudo dnf update -y --best

Thanks, here comes the info:
$ rpm -q qt5-qtbase qt5-qtbase-5.6.1-3.fc24.x86_64
$ sudo dnf update -y --best Failed to synchronize cache for repo 'fedora-chromium-stable', disabling. Last metadata expiration check: 2:43:40 ago on Thu Oct 13 17:41:07 2016. Error: package kf5-akonadi-socialutils-16.04.3-2.fc24.x86_64 requires kf5-akonadi(x86-64) = 16.04.3-2.fc24, but none of the providers can be installed. package kf5-akonadi-socialutils-devel-16.04.3-2.fc24.x86_64 requires kf5-akonadi(x86-64) = 16.04.3-2.fc24, but none of the providers can be installed. package rubygem-fog-libvirt-0.0.3-2.fc24.noarch requires rubygem(ruby-libvirt) < 0.7.0, but none of the providers can be installed. package kf5-akonadi-socialutils-devel-16.04.3-2.fc24.x86_64 requires kf5-akonadi(x86-64) = 16.04.3-2.fc24, but none of the providers can be installed. package kf5-akonadi-socialutils-16.04.3-2.fc24.x86_64 requires kf5-akonadi(x86-64) = 16.04.3-2.fc24, but none of the providers can be installed (try to add '--allowerasing' to command line to replace conflicting packages)

To you first question:
$ sudo dnf repolist Failed to synchronize cache for repo 'fedora-chromium-stable', disabling. Last metadata expiration check: 2:54:01 ago on Thu Oct 13 17:41:07 2016. repo id repo name status adobe-linux-x86_64 Adobe Systems Incorporated 2 *fedora Fedora 24 - x86_64 49,722 fedora-cisco-openh264 Fedora 24 openh264 (From Cisco) - x86_64 7 fedora-steam negativo17 - Steam 20 remi-php70 Remi's RPM repository - PHP 7.0 - Fedora 24 - x86_64 238 rpmfusion-free RPM Fusion for Fedora 24 - Free 352 rpmfusion-free-updates RPM Fusion for Fedora 24 - Free - Updates 336 rpmfusion-nonfree RPM Fusion for Fedora 24 - Nonfree 89 rpmfusion-nonfree-updates RPM Fusion for Fedora 24 - Nonfree - Updates 139 *updates Fedora 24 - x86_64 - Updates 11,668 *updates-testing Fedora 24 - x86_64 - Test Updates 1,618 virtualbox Fedora 24 - x86_64 - VirtualBox 9

Ah, looks like one missing Obsoletes: kf5-akonadi-socialutils-devel
So, workaround in the short-term would be to do: dnf remove kf5-akonadi-socialutils-devel
and then update as usual short proceed better.
(In reply to Rex Dieter from comment #6) > Ah, looks like one missing > Obsoletes: kf5-akonadi-socialutils-devel don't forget to add "<" or "<="

Thanks, worked like a charm!
$ sudo dnf remove kf5-akonadi-socialutils-devel Dependencies resolved. ============================================================================================================================================================================================================================================================================================ Package Arch Version Repository Size ============================================================================================================================================================================================================================================================================================ Removing: kf5-akonadi-socialutils-devel x86_64 16.04.3-2.fc24 @updates-testing 22 k
Transaction Summary ============================================================================================================================================================================================================================================================================================ Remove 1 Package
Installed size: 22 k Is this ok [y/N]: y Running transaction check Transaction check succeeded. Running transaction test Transaction test succeeded. Running transaction Erasing : kf5-akonadi-socialutils-devel-16.04.3-2.fc24.x86_64 1/1 Verifying : kf5-akonadi-socialutils-devel-16.04.3-2.fc24.x86_64 1/1
Removed: kf5-akonadi-socialutils-devel.x86_64 16.04.3-2.fc24
Complete! $ sudo dnf remove kf5-akonadi-socialutils Dependencies resolved. ============================================================================================================================================================================================================================================================================================ Package Arch Version Repository Size ============================================================================================================================================================================================================================================================================================ Removing: kf5-akonadi-socialutils x86_64 16.04.3-2.fc24 @updates-testing 145 k
Transaction Summary ============================================================================================================================================================================================================================================================================================ Remove 1 Package
Installed size: 145 k Is this ok [y/N]: y Running transaction check Transaction check succeeded. Running transaction test Transaction test succeeded. Running transaction Erasing : kf5-akonadi-socialutils-16.04.3-2.fc24.x86_64 1/1 Verifying : kf5-akonadi-socialutils-16.04.3-2.fc24.x86_64 1/1
Removed: kf5-akonadi-socialutils.x86_64 16.04.3-2.fc24
Complete! $ sudo dnf update Failed to synchronize cache for repo 'fedora-chromium-stable', disabling. Last metadata expiration check: 2:56:49 ago on Fri Oct 14 05:42:26 2016. Dependencies resolved. ============================================================================================================================================================================================================================================================================================ Package Arch Version Repository Size ============================================================================================================================================================================================================================================================================================ Installing: kf5-akonadi-contacts x86_64 16.08.1-1.fc24 updates 395 k replacing kf5-akonadi.x86_64 16.04.3-2.fc24 replacing kf5-akonadi-contact.x86_64 16.04.3-2.fc24 kf5-akonadi-contacts-devel x86_64 16.08.1-1.fc24 updates 34 k replacing kf5-akonadi-contact-devel.x86_64 16.04.3-2.fc24 Upgrading: kf5-akonadi-mime x86_64 16.08.1-1.fc24 updates 101 k replacing kf5-akonadi.x86_64 16.04.3-2.fc24 kf5-akonadi-mime-devel x86_64 16.08.1-1.fc24 updates 48 k kf5-akonadi-notes x86_64 16.08.1-1.fc24 updates 29 k replacing kf5-akonadi.x86_64 16.04.3-2.fc24 kf5-akonadi-notes-devel x86_64 16.08.1-1.fc24 updates 15 k kf5-akonadi-server x86_64 16.08.1-2.fc24 updates 1.9 M kf5-akonadi-server-devel x86_64 16.08.1-2.fc24 updates 253 k kf5-akonadi-server-mysql x86_64 16.08.1-2.fc24 updates 11 k kf5-kldap x86_64 16.08.1-1.fc24 updates 125 k kf5-kldap-devel x86_64 16.08.1-1.fc24 updates 33 k kf5-kmailtransport x86_64 16.08.1-1.fc24 updates 207 k kf5-kmailtransport-devel x86_64 16.08.1-1.fc24 updates 31 k Skipping packages with broken dependencies: rubygem-ruby-libvirt x86_64 0.7.0-1.fc24 updates-testing 87 k
